name: Mystery of the Witch's Shoes
overview: Mystery of the Witch's Shoes is an educational game. It contains two games designed to teach sequences: Mystery of the Witch's Shoes: the player must correctly state which event occurs next in a story related to lost shoes. There are 10 questions with 3 choices each. The Candle Game: the player must transform two candles from the starting to the finishing position by placing 3 instructions in the correct order.
